p: The index case (ID No.1) was diagnosed as having an upper respiratory infection with a peak temperature of 38.4 °C, a neutrophil count of 72.2% (normal range, 50–70%), percentage of lymphocytes of 22.2% (normal range, 20–40%), and white blood cell count of 7.8 × 10 9/L (normal range, 4.0–10.0 × 10 9/L).
